page.title: 04Communications
page.content: The {Road }system bisects the area,phy sically and socially.The two communiti es rarely mix.Both North-South roads a re very busy.The A530 is the main link between the mid-Cheshire towns and Lei ghton Hospital and Nantwich.Warmingham Lane is the shortest route between Mid dlewich and Crewe.{Buses}are few and f ar between.There is one bus between Wa rmingham,Crewe and Wimboldsley on Satu rdays.Minshull Vernon has 14 buses a d ay mid week and 2 buses on a Sunday. Most people drive their own cars,motor bikes or cycles.The {Shropshire Union {Canal }is now used for recreation and is busy in the summer.The {Railway }is the main Western line linking Crewe with Scotland and the North of England and is very busy.The area is criss- crossed by a network of {Footpaths} .Many are are in danger of disappear- ing as they are not sign-posted.
